diff_act: 9.ensure comprehensive tracking of outbreak spread across multiple jurisdictions

regen.absent_element: mechanism for tracking evolving contact statuses
regen.new_specification: The system shall continuously track the statuses of contacts to ensure updated information is available for investigators to act upon.

regen.absent_element: updating and maintaining contact statuses for outbreak tracking
regen.new_specification: The system shall track, update, and maintain the health status of contacts to facilitate comprehensive outbreak tracking and monitoring across jurisdictions.
The system should allow updating contact statuses to ensure up-to-date tracing information is maintained for effective contact exposure tracing.

label: It allows multiple contacts to be linked to a single case.
absence: multiple contacts to be linked to a single case
